website_summaries.verdict: A versatile security light for a wide outdoor area. While the adjustable timer is a plus, lack of an always-on mode and a tendency to fill with water are drawbacks.
pros: Each spotlight adjusts to cover a wide area
Adjustable timer keeps lights illuminated up to 10 minutes
cons: Motion sensor doesn’t have the range some customers want, and some have difficulty adjusting the sensor
Reports of fixture filling with water after heavy rain and shorting out

customer_reviews.title: Got a defective unit - But Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Got a defective unit. Wiring is simple enough (hot/neutral/ground) but upon powering up the unit made a quick buzz/hum sound and tripped the breaker. I checked the wiriing, insulation on all the wires, but everything was intact. I put back the old motion detector light which still works (but is about 300 watts!). They responded promptly, on a Saturday and Sunday even, and offered to send a replacement and return shipping label. Hopefully I got a rare defective unit and the new one will be in line with the majority near-5 star experience. I can say that the customer service has been top-notch so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nhoj Cunrok

customer_reviews.title: Good motion detection light
customer_reviews.text: The light is nice and bright has a lot of adjustment for where the light is needed and time needed. Easy to install. Simple three wires. White, black, and multicolor. White to white, black to black and multi to green. Plus came with connectors and proper screws. Once done secure to base plate then done. Any diy person will take less then 20 minutes. Any others might take close to an hour tops. Now my drawback. The dials aren’t per say timed just a twist to get min/max an estimate at best.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: My favorite comment from the neighbors (since we were seeing a ...
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who can find a reason to not give this 5 stars is really reaching into their imagination to find one. The installation was simple, and replaced the existing standard light over my garage door. The adjustments for the motion sensor were simple enough to follow. My favorite comment from the neighbors (since we were seeing a larger string of car theft activity in our neighborhood) was "Finally, something that's brighter than the street lights!" It's power, completely fills all the voids the neighbors' cameras miss from low night vision distance issues, and makes everything crystal clear on screens. Anything more powerful and you're probably covering something more than a 2-car garage.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt & Sam McLeod

customer_reviews.title: First rain and one fixture filled with water.
customer_reviews.text: Like any light, it was easy to put up. However, I was a little stumped that that base does not overlap an electrical box. Instead it sits flush so I made sure to use a good amount of calking. I live in Arizona so we don't get that much rain, but the light would be exposed so I made sure to buy a light that was designed for the elements. We got 1 decent rain and one of the fixtures is half filled with water. So much for being made for wet conditions. I'm reaching out to the selling for a resolution. I don't feel comfortable having a risk of electrical damage.
customer_reviews.author: Clark McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Update/Not good
customer_reviews.text: Originally I gave this a good review as I installed easily and it was bright and functioned well. We've had it for a little over a year and one bulb already out and can't be replaced. This really made me mad because we are not at the house a lot and rarely turn this light on, so it should have lasted a long time. Don't buy it unless you plan on installing a new one in a short amount of time. VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Linam g

customer_reviews.title: Low-Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Very low-quality product. The sensitivity and time controls on the bottom were tiny and hard to turn, and one was actually loose and would push into the machine when I tried to turn it. Once it was all hooked up, only one of the lights would work when turned on by the motion sensor. The "Test Mode" would work in daytime, turning on both lights, but it didn't work at night at all. There were so many issues with this machine that I just removed it from its mount, and re-packaged it and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Pensive Pundit

customer_reviews.title: Not very big
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to install on our garage. Was a lot smaller than I anticipated, but as long as it lit up I thought that would be fine. Well, no matter what setting I put it on it comes on only after I reach the garage door and only stays on for a few seconds. I have tried adjusting the settings multiple times, but it never changes.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install looked nice and worked well for two weeks. Then one of the bulbs stopped working, unfortunately I didn’t install this for about five months so it’s too late to return it. Would have received five stars otherwise .
customer_reviews.author: Bakerboy

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these now. The first one has been in service as a "dusk to dawn" light for over a year and works fine. So, I bought another one for a different spot as a motion detector light. They are both completely exposed to the weather, so I wanted something waterproof and these seem to be.
customer_reviews.author: woodnknoll

customer_reviews.title: Know your settings.........
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice unit for the price...we will see how she stands up and lasts for a few seasons at least hopefully......at first she did not turn off at all once it was dark outside.......it seems the middle selling....for time duration....it pretty sensitive....but once you figure her out she works fine.....enjoy yours....we seem to enjoy the LED lights....now to purchase a few more and change the others out
customer_reviews.author: Vin-man

customer_reviews.title: It's a pain to install
customer_reviews.text: Two days after the return deadline, one of the lights went over to the dark side. As these are not simple bulb lights, I'll just wait for the other light to fail and then replace it with something hopefully made in America. After finally getting it wired, mounted and programmed, I was ready to give it 4 stars. Now I wouldn't give it one star if someone paid me. Thirty some dollars for thirty some days service is not a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Gray

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: Great buy ease to install and lights are bright some led lights are extremely bright but these are just wright. Motion sensor works well just tweak the setting your your desired area. I placed mine behind the house over my garage to enhance the rear of the house viewing because my rear camera infrared red wasn't very clear at night. The flood light help in getting more light when motion was detected. You wont regret this flood light.
customer_reviews.author: fabio liberatore

customer_reviews.title: product is well made and bright however sensor only worked ...
customer_reviews.text: product is well made and bright however sensor only worked for a few days then practically stopped altogether.. at first it would sense me walking across drive about 30 feet away.... after several days the sensor weakened to mere feet and finally i had to waive my hand 6 inches from light to get it to come on late at night.... the sensitivity adjustment only caused sensor to activate in more or less light and had no effect on distance.. i am returning this for refund hopefully if i ever get a return lable from customer service...they are very unhelpful and questioned everything i said about light....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: I am a electrician and I have install about 15 of these light fixtures. Not all have been bought threw Amazon. They have different name on the box, but same identical light fixture. I used to buy from my local electrical supply store, but they no longer have them in stock because of short supply. So I found them online at Amazon. I really like the simple install and they work Great.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN Z.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Purchased 2 of these lights. When installed, the only things that worked were the flood light on permanently and dusk to dawn. When the motion sensor setting was used, the light came on as dusk to dawn instead of coming on only when motion was detected. Called both Amazon customer service and the product company customer service. Since this product has a 5 year warranty, you would think that I would be offered a replacement. But, NO, nothing was mentioned about that! Haven't owned 30 days yet! If you are thinking about purchasing this product, DON'T. Save your money, your time and your frustration!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I am still trying to work out adjustments. There are no significant markings on the settings and they are underneath the light. To adjust them at night, means staring into the light to see them. It might be better with instructions, but the installer threw them away. So I am stuck with setting it by trial and error over many nights.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: Not so weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: The light is definitely of $30 quality and overseas manufacturing standards. I bought shoplights from this Manufacturer almost 2 years ago and they have performed well inside my Pole Barn. The light assembly is sealed poorly to be used for outdoors as seen from other reviews. I completely disassembled the unit to investigate the complaints and verified poor seals throughout the housing that would surely allow water to enter. I resealed the unit and reassembled it to see how long it will last without moisture entering the components. We will see...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Quality touches where it matters
customer_reviews.text: I've had this working on the side of my house for about 2 months. The sensor is accurate and the light is bright but not ridiculous. The instructions are weirdly written but you can figure it out. I followed tips from other reviews and added silicone sealant around the edges. I appreciate that they provided o-ring gaskets for the screws. It shows they cared about making a product that /might/ last a while.
customer_reviews.author: TheDude

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily with included hardware and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy install and the included hardware (screws, etc) all worked with with the electrical box that I used. A similar unit from a different manufacturer had screws that didn't fit the holes my electrical box (probably metric or just wrong). This hardware fit perfectly. There was even a small rubber cap to cover the screw cap that attaches the lamp to the electrical box. Nicely designed and packaged.
customer_reviews.author: JeremyK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Security Lights
customer_reviews.text: Very well made lights that were easy to install even though the mode instructions were very muddled. I originally bought 2 Defiant lights from the big orange store but one work at all so I returned them and after seeing the good reviews on these lights, ordered them. The housings are very solid and the led lights are very bright and easy to adjust. Highly recommend these security lights for around your property.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Works as presented  to amazon shoppers
customer_reviews.text: To place on a flat surface without an existing hole in the wall you can clip the main bolt in half with bolt cutters and gently file the edges. The mount is waterproof sealed even with wires exposed. The wire colors match typical block white and green. Motion light works amazing reaching 60ft easily and is very sensitive but doesn’t just go off when the wind blows so that is good. Well worth the money. Definitely buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: You can do it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a new generation of lightning. LED seems to do a great job of lighting my driveway. I installed the new lights by myself. I am 77 years old and had no problem removing the 30 year fixture and installing this fixture. Just take your time and get the right tools to do the job including a 8 foot ladder. Keep your wife close so you have someone to fuss at if the job gets too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Morris

customer_reviews.title: Love the light itself
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these. Love the light itself...stylish, bright, low power consumption...but the motion sensors are junk. Replaced them with  Heath Zenith 180 degree sensor and they are working great. The sensor that came with the light would come on at dark and usually stay on. Sometimes it would shut off for a minute or 2, but then come back on. Flipping the switch to reset the unit didn't work. Light is great. ..stock sensors junk.
customer_reviews.author: SprintDog

customer_reviews.title: Really Bright and covers a lot of sqft.
customer_reviews.text: Here is my take on the lights so far ..... First off I just got them installed by my electrican . They work really well they light up everything .I installed them in the front of the house and the back of the house. Basically in every corner of the house. They work . But here is my one thing that i think should be done is label the timer in seconds minutes and how long it will last. I see that might be the one thing that is not good about the lights . But once again I will say these lights are exactly what I wanted in led flood lights... Really bright....
customer_reviews.author: Luis Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend...
customer_reviews.text: i Purchased this security light to replace an old fixture that was not motion activated. After about a year and a half one of the lights stopped working and the other went out about 2 months later. The motion detector still works, it lights up when motion is detected.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Motion on, never goes off.
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this item for a couple of days. Have read the on line users manual plus the booklet that came with the light. Have tried 3 different ways to get it to actually work as a motion sensor light. It will come on, but it never goes off.
customer_reviews.author: Newfie Lover

customer_reviews.title: Randomly comes on every few seconds/minutes all night long
customer_reviews.text: Randomly comes on every few seconds/minutes all night long. You can't count on it as a security measure due to that flaw! Luckily I mounted it right above the garage door just to light up the driveway when we pull up. I'm glad I did not order a 2nd one for the backyard or it would keep waking us up all night long!
customer_reviews.author: Signtist

customer_reviews.title: Work's great under eave
customer_reviews.text: I needed new lights for my house. Everything appears to be going to side wall mounted. Hard to find security lights that can adjust under an eave anymore I wasn't sure if it would be okay. These work great. Construction good, mounting is easy. Light is awesome! Ordering two more. Would recommend for either way you want to mount them. will work fine either way.
customer_reviews.author: OldDad

customer_reviews.title: Pleased in how easy to install as replacement for old non LED that went out on my house.
customer_reviews.text: This 2nd of these I have purchased. First one was in June of 2019. Found it was easy replacement for existing different model that went out. That continues to work well and latest one to replace another location on my house and again simple to install. The LED lights are bright and motion detector works well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Hachtel

customer_reviews.title: Bright and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Really like this light. Easy to install and programs easily. The light is exceptionally bright. We have it installed at our cabin in the woods and therefore don't have the motion detector set. Right now we don't know how it will do in the weather as it is under the eaves of the roof.
customer_reviews.author: nanforusa

customer_reviews.title: nice so far
customer_reviews.text: works well and looks nice- only had them for a few months so cant speak to long term. I tried a heath-zenith that required screw in bulbs but the led ones I bought (met specs exactly) just flashed and were incompatible...so decided one that included the bulbs was way to go
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: MOTION  ???
customer_reviews.text: well built, good light, bought 3 of these, all 3 the motion detection failed in a month or so or are very questionable if they work properly. had to set to dusk to dawn.
customer_reviews.author: garboy

customer_reviews.title: Easy and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I received a replacement for my first light, one of the two lamps had burned out and they were very helpful with the process of returning the light. They sent a complete replacement. Changing it out was very easy. As with all electrical items you just need to be sure the electricity to the light is off, then follow the easy directions. Thanks for the great light and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Westall

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING WITHIN SIX MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: STOPPED WORKING WITHIN SIX MONTHS! Buy something of better quality than this is... Outrageous this only lasted six months!
customer_reviews.author: lisa c

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I light works as expected it is easy to connect and works as designed. The minus I have is the lights don't come out so if the bulbs go I will need to replace the whole unit. The LED lights are rated for 10 years. So we shall see. This was very easy to install if this unit is replacing an existing one be sure to use the supplied backing bar the screws for this light are a little bigger then the standard ones. Connects the wires don't forget to ground the unit tighten the center screw and seal all of the edges with some waterproof sealant and don't forget the center screw and you should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for Amazon’s easy returns. 0 stars for this light’s quality. Ended up ordering a second one because the first tripped the breaker immediately. Received the replacement and did the exact same thing. Ordered a 3rd of a different brand/model that works just fine. Had the hassle and waste of time installing 2 bad ones. Hopefully, the manufacturer is quarantining what appears to be a bad/mis-wired batch and on to ones that don’t have the issue. Too bad for me though, I really liked this flood light.
customer_reviews.author: GreatDane21

customer_reviews.title: Great Light at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Installed my light about a week ago and am very happy with it. The light was easy to program, very bright light, and great range. It was installed on a brick wall replacing an approximately 50 year old fixture. Even matching up old-to-new wiring/housing and on an uneven surface it went well. Used some exterior caulk around the top and sides, leaving room at the bottom in case there is water intrusion. So far, so good. Again, am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joy E. Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spot lights
customer_reviews.text: I needed to install the unit higher than the instructions indicate, so the operation chart doesn't apply. I use the "dusk to Dawn" feature. We are happy with this item. I recommend this item to anyone who is interested in a great lighting system.
customer_reviews.author: F. T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not able to waterproof for heavy rain
customer_reviews.text: The switches can't be rain proof unless I stuff silicone around them. And I don't trust the lamp bases to be waterproof. So I put this under my porch roof. But still used a lot of silicone to keep out as much moisture as I could.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: A bit less light than I thought and I goofed up the auto turn on somehow but otherwise they work great and is really all I need. Certainly better than installing three different lights with three different switches. If you buy it I think you will like it if the light you need is not too much but still enough to go about 40 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Photography

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Bright, easy to install, easy to. Adjust.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my old halogen lights. Work well for soffit and eve mounting but you need to rotate the motion sensor 180 degrees to get proper coverage. The various settings work as advertised. I bought 4 of these lights and all work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: The initial light that I received did not work properly. After trying everything I contacted the seller Torchstar. I was given instructions to reset the light however it did not fix the problem. Torchstar immediately sent me a new light. So far it is working great. Very bright light that covers a large area for such a compact design. Very pleased with the light as well as Torchstar for backing their products.
customer_reviews.author: winkler

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit because of the reviews. Wasn’t worth the money. This light comes on during the day regardless of your setting. The motion sensor must be overly sensitive because the light only turn off for a few minutes then comes right back on even though there is no movement.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland USA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace another one that was not working right. The brightness is sufficient to light up my patio. I have it set to Dusk To Dawn, so I cannot comment on the motion detection aspects. But, unlike another one I have, when set to minimum, it works perfect for that application, waiting till dark, and turning off in the morning. Since it is an LED type, and supposed to last long, I will keep it in this mode till it dies.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Bright light with some issues
customer_reviews.text: This light is super bright, easy to install. However after weeks of tinkering with the motion detection and the dusk to Dawn sensor, I am still unable to get them to work. The motion sensor setting forces the light to turn right back on after about 1 second of turning off. I have even covered the sensors to insure there is no movement. She. It is set to the dusk to Dawn setting, the light never shuts off. No matter how the settings are adjusted. I tried shining a bright flashlight into the sensor and the light never shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Way too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: This thing is worthless unless you wish to upset your neighbors with a bright light that constantly turns on all night. With the lux (sensitivity) adjustment all the way down and the range at the minimum also, it turns on constantly. I suppose if you wanted a slow strobe, you could set the time duration all the way down too, then it would just blink! Maybe use colored lenses and it's nice for Christmas? Don't buy this thing, it does not work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Rumble

customer_reviews.title: Only for security illumination
customer_reviews.text: Instructions very difficult to read without magnification and a bit confusing. These are very bright white lights. It would have been nice if these lights could be used as security lights AND regular illumination without having to climb on a ladder. Our other security lights can be turned on, and will stay on, if the wall switch is flipped on - off - then on again.
customer_reviews.author: JayMTNbug

customer_reviews.title: Light turns on constantly and stays on for a long period of time
customer_reviews.text: This light turns on so many times by itself and stays on for hours a long period of time (even after 30 minutes it didnt turn off!) I dont understand it. I tried changing settings and still turns on so many times and stays for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C.

customer_reviews.title: It never turns off after detecting motion.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t recommend this light. Even on the lowest settings, it often doesn’t shut off. It’s super frustrating that the light stays on all night.
customer_reviews.author: Team V

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. Had to modify installation location but had ...
customer_reviews.text: Lights perform as expected . Easy installation. Had to modify installation location but had no issues installing. Lenses are free turning. Don't know if that is intended or a design flaw but seem to stay in position.LEDs emit plenty of light and seem a little softer than conventional spotlights.Instructions are simple and adjusting sensitivity and duration are also easily understood. One just has to set lights to desirable settings. I purchased 2 sets. One for front of house one for the back. One set arrived with smudges on the outside. Almost as if it had been used and then returned. However all screws connectors and gaskets were unopened. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: LMScib

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensor works great as does the timer setting
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed both lights in a very short time. They are exactly what we wanted on our house to shine onto our deck. Motion sensor works great as does the timer setting. Easy to adjust where you want the lights aimed. Gives off a nice brightness. We would absolutely recommend these lights. we also had an issue with water entering into the lens on 1 set of lamps moths after installation, Torchstar is replacing. Thank You Torchstar . Love these lights
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good!
customer_reviews.text: The product configuration did not allow me to use it as I had intended so I have not installed it anywhere. I should have thought more about my physical layout before I purchased the floodlight. When I change out one of my other fixtures I will use it. It looks good and I'm sure it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: and everything has been working just fine since. Very satisfied with these motion lights
customer_reviews.text: Had an electrician remove an old motion detection fixture that had quit working and replace it with the LeonLite. Took him about 20 minutes to replace the old fixture and install the new one. No problems whatsoever; the sensor and the timer were adjusted per our preference, the shielded lights aimed where needed, and everything has been working just fine since. Very satisfied with these motion lights; very, very bright, they come on as expected and turn off likewise. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: QBN

customer_reviews.title: You cannot replace the bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, you cannot replace the bulbs??? One burned out after 6 months... now I have to have an electrician out AGAIN AND I have to buy a whole new light fixture. I DEFINITELY do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Burned out LEDs in less than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Lights failed after 2 weeks. Looks like the sensor is still working and it's not shorted out since it's on the same circuit as the porch light, which still works. Appears water has entered the sensor housing, which seems strange for an outdoor light.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: Good price and great features
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. One of them was non-functional and Amazon took care of refund/replacement with no hassles. They are working well, seem to be of quality construction and I like the easy settings for different modes (on-off/on at dusk off at dawn/on at night when motion detected). Came with wire nuts, mounting plate, foam gasket and all hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Dog

customer_reviews.title: New techno light.
customer_reviews.text: This light was a great replacement for Our 20yr old incandescent light fixture. The warm white and 20w power use was a great improvement. It really does a nice job lighting the back porch.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light to light my courtyard at night when my dogs go out. They have to turn a corner to get to the back yard and it is very dark there. Because I can point the lights in 2 different directions, my deck now lights up when my dogs go out and I can actually see to go and get them without worrying about tripping in the dark or carrying a flashlight. I bought the warm lights and it is the perfect lighting. The other would have been way too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Pupmom

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Holy shi* these things are bright! Couldn’t have asked for a better replacement to our old halogen flood lights. Easy installation if you’re not a total tard. These light up a huge area around our 2 car garage. Very pleased with these. I highly recommend them as a replacement for old halogen bulbs. No heat and way less electricity used.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as described
customer_reviews.text: The light is either on or off. I have spent hours trying to get the sensitivity to work with no luck. It either does not turn on with motion, or it turns on and stays on. You can't imagine how many mornings I have walked into my carport to find the light on (presumably for the whole night). I ordered two of these lights and have not put the second one up because the first has been such as hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Darsie

customer_reviews.title: Two big problems!
customer_reviews.text: So frustrated. Two problems. One, it doesn't detect motion well. Sometimes it detects me, other times not, in the same spot. I walk the dogs at night, same pattern, detection is hit or miss. Two, it turns on and off without any motion all through the night. Even the neighbors complained! The settings are correct, I've triple checked. I also have a camera and know that motion isn't happening when the light turns on.
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: Lasts 2 years. Bulbs can't be changed.
customer_reviews.text: This item worked fine for 2-1/2 years, then one light stopped working. One month later, the other light failed. THESE BULBS CANNOT BE CHANGED, you have to replace the entire fixture.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to hook up. Brightness is good. Bulbs are LED so it should last. Replaces a cheaper product from China that died in 4 months. IF this one has some longevity in its DNA then I would give it 5 stars. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: vettelover84

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 of these lights (2 double head and 1 triple head) to install on our back patio. Installation was pretty simple if you understand basic electrical work. Fixtures are a good quality and should last. Really like the ability to be able to adjust motion sensitivity, distance and time the light stays on. Good feature that you can change to on, if you want to have it stay on for an extended period, or dusk to dawn. Just purchased 3 more for other areas.
customer_reviews.author: Oak49

customer_reviews.title: The directions are really bad grammar like someone used a dictionary to translate to ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all these do work fairly well. The directions are really bad grammar like someone used a dictionary to translate to 2 other languages and then to English, very very hard to follow. The time setting says it goes from 10 sec to 6 min, actually is 10sec to 6 hours. If you want 5 min, turn it a very small amount off of min.
customer_reviews.author: TI99

customer_reviews.title: Problematic
customer_reviews.text: One side stopped working after a year. On remote building almost never visited at night so little use. Tried every setting, never detected more than about 20 ft away. Needed longer distance.
customer_reviews.author: Digger

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied, Great Install
customer_reviews.text: Never installed anything like this before but I put it up in less than 30 minutes with no electrical experience. I stripped the main screw trying to adjust the wires but company was fantastic and sent out a new screw the next day!! Light is very bright and lights up entire deck. Very satisfied and we will see how it handles an Ohio winter soon enough!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Junk, stay away
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these their junk, I mounted them and they work when ever, don’t shut off, you can stand right in front of them and won’t come on, wave your arms you see a red light still won’t work, and then out of the blue their on then off, I’ve tried everything but I can’t get to work properly
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, easy to install, and the sensor works well. This item has adjustable timer and sensitivity on the sensor. It does a great job of shining a beam onto a 30ftx30ft area in my backyard. The sensor always turns on when something gets within 20ft of it (may work further if sensor was aimed slightly higher).
customer_reviews.author: C James

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are weak
customer_reviews.text: The operating instructions need to have a diagram of the controls. The engraving on the bottom of the PIR is very small and difficult to read leaving one to guess at the function of each of the knobs and switch position. After fooling with the options, I finally got it to work, but a simple diagram pointing out the features and functions would be very helpful. The product is bright and works fine now that I spent more than a few hours monkeying around with the control panel.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt D Markshausen

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but there are better ones
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had numerous motion lights. This one is LED, which casts a cold white light, much like a mall parking lot. The instructions could be better and should include a diagram of the various dials, not just written instructions . I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Swim1419

customer_reviews.title: They do not last long.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light on September 28, 2019 and it was installed under an overhang, protected from the weather. One of the lights just stopped working. Because I am past Amazon’s 30 day return window I have to go through the manufacture for a possible replacement or my money returned. Not impressed at all since it did not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Craig P

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old security light, whose motion detect cover was falling apart. This is part of my sweeping replacement of all lights in my house with LED lights. The installation was very easy, as it was a replacement for an existing, similar light fixture. The lights are bright and the motion sensors work well. The fixture seems sturdy enough, but I'm hesitant to give 5 stars as I don't know the longevity until I experience it.
customer_reviews.author: Minh Pham

customer_reviews.title: Not able to turn on constant with via light switch like some models- disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, brightness is sufficient, a little unsure of detection at this time. The unit does not have the capability to power on/off light switch to turn on constant at night. You can only turn on via ladder and button.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: I am particularly happy that I had a choice other than black or ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to install this on my own (55-year-old female) with the exception of sealing the fixture, which I'll need help with. The instructions were clear, the testing simple, and it is a very bright light which is what I wanted. I am particularly happy that I had a choice other than black or white, this is a very nice brown color. I'm happy w/the purchase and will likely get one more for the other side of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lorene

customer_reviews.title: Performs as it should
customer_reviews.text: For the first while with this light fixture, it seemed to keep coming on and going off at erratic times not necessarily corresponding with nearby motion. However after speaking with Torchstar customer service they offered some helpful tips on placement and sensitivity settings of this light and now I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: James Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and returned them when one of the two did not control properly. I was contacted by their Customer Service Department with an offer of another similar unit to try. They sent me one and it works great, I intend on ordering another two, of that similar slightly more expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: James - Oneof6

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: JUNK. I purchased 3 of theses units and installed them on a customers house. All 3 malfunctioned and would not go into auto mode no matter how many times i reset them and toggled the programming swich.
customer_reviews.author: A. Segarra

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: I tried using old spot light fixtures with new LED light bulbs and for whatever reason it seemed they would not turn off anymore. Went to this all in one design, and it work great. Easy to install. Only concern is if one of the lights burn out, the whole fixture has to be changed out.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Super bright
customer_reviews.text: I just installed one and so far it works perfect. It has a wide range sensor which is awesome. I really love it so far and it is really bright!
customer_reviews.author: Nathion

customer_reviews.title: Working As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these up for a few days but they seem to be working as advertised. I made sure to caulk around the enclosure to help prevent moisture from getting inside the housing. I have them set to the dusk-to-dawn setting, so, I can't speak to the motion detection.
customer_reviews.author: Jared B.

customer_reviews.title: They’re easy to adjust and set the timer and sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Very bright lights and saved $6.00 on my electric bill from the old flood lights every month. They’re easy to adjust and set the timer and sensitivity. The lights are blinding when pulling up the drive way and will light out to 30ft to the street.
customer_reviews.author: cheeseball

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far!
customer_reviews.text: Brighter than I expected. Replaced a halogen bulb that I think just overheated itself to death. The energy savings will probably pay for this item in a few years. If you're mounting to an existing round box, be aware that this attaches with a center bolt. My old lights had screws that attached to the outer rim of the round box.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this LED security light to replace one (different brand) that had a faulty motion sensor. Really like the option that I can use it as a regular light, motion light or dusk to dawn light. It's only been a few days since installation but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: zebrasden

customer_reviews.title: Defective Light - Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This item stopped working five months after we purchased it. The lights started blinking for no reason and then stopped working all together. When the manufacturer finally responded, he couldn't explain it. Instead he wants us to ship the item back to him (our cost) and then pay for a new one to be shipped. No way. Save yourself the hassle and find another light. I've always been happy with Amazon's support, but not this time. Stand behind the products you sell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other reviews. It stopped working after five months after we had a heavy rainstorm. The light was installed by an electrician under the roof line so it had the best conditions to work. I took the light down and installed another light so the electrical line was not the issue.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Shipped very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was unable to use these due to the mounting angle, the quality seemed excellent and the shipping was very fast
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: One Light Dead
customer_reviews.text: The product came with a 5-year warranty. One of the lights has blown in less than 2 years. I emailed Torchstar directly since I cannot message them through Amazon (order window closed). I am waiting to hear from Torchstar, hoping they will honor the 5-year warranty. I will update this review if they do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LED Outdoor Security Light is Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I used a spacer to mount to, under my carport. I'm using the light program to the nighttime motion detector. I'm very satisfied the way the light works. The LED light is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Mr LG Detail & Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of the 3 didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: not sensitive enough. 1 did not work out of the box. mounted on front of building so would go off when someone pulls up to door and gets out of their car. Have to be right at it for it to go off. Range only 10 foot. Poor when you buy 3 and 1 out of the 3 does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Random "motion" detection detracts from this light's features.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this light looks, its brightness, and when it works, its motion detection, but I have now tried (and returned) two of these and both had the same problem. Despite any changes in settings I attempted, both lights activated approximately twice a minute, even when there was no motion to activate them. I went so far as to sit for extended periods of time to watch for anything that could have been tripping the motion sensor, but in almost every case there appeared to be none.
customer_reviews.author: Lance C.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Item was missing a washer, but I had one of my own that fit. Everything else is great
customer_reviews.author: Perky

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: The light has a nice beam, it is a bright white color and lights up the back yard. You can turn each fixture and point it to your desired direction. The timer adjustment is nice I have it on for about 5 minutes if the motion sensor is tripped there are many options for the timer. The color has a nice finish and looks like it won't fade out soon, but time will tell on that.
customer_reviews.author: Edison

customer_reviews.title: Great if it Remain on Through the Night
customer_reviews.text: After reading and trying all of the suggestions as to how to make the light function in the dawn to dusk, stay on, nothing works to keep it from reverting back to the automatic come on and go off with the motion detector function! Otherwise, it really puts out a lot of light, and can fool it into staying on with the turning on and off of the CGFI switch. It then reverts back to the auto mode which will not stay on when desired.
customer_reviews.author: Firefighter Ed

customer_reviews.title: Install on these was easy, though the instructions weren't necessarily the best
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these to replace some old and broken halogen floods. Install on these was easy, though the instructions weren't necessarily the best. The wiring could be shortened up a bit for the leads that are already capped together and aren't going to be connected to anything else. It was a little challenging to fit it all in the box. Is there an application where you might undo those? Maybe. But for your average homeowner (read: limited electrical experience) I had no plans of messing with it. Also, these are a bright, cool light. Sensitivity is good. They've been up for 2 weeks so hopefully they'll last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Optimus_Mike

customer_reviews.title: so I can only tell you so far so good. If that changes
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it too long, so I can only tell you so far so good. If that changes, I will update. But as I'm still in the honeymoon phase: It replaced an older fixture under the eave and corner of the house. The installation was a breeze. Fits perfectly where the old one was. Offers as much coverage as a three-prong. The light is daylight bright. I use it with the sensor, which seems sensitive enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This item was installed to replace an old floodlight. Installation was easy and the light was bright and wide to cover a large area.
customer_reviews.author: Leejo

customer_reviews.title: Great security lights, cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Took me about 20 minutes start to finish. The lights have a "test mode" function, which allows for easier light positioning and sensor direction placement. The base unit connects directly to a 4" round electrical box. If you don't have one inset into your wall, or cannot install one in the wall, you can install an external electrical box. I used a 4" round with 1.5" depth to allow for wiring to fit. Worked great. The LED should be more cost effective for me in the long run. Overall, extremely satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: 9 months and 2 out of 3 still work
customer_reviews.text: Bought and installed 3 units in February 18 and now November 18 2 are still working and 1 has only 1 working light. Not very convenient that it’s the one at my front door. Edit- Down to 2 star. 2/3 still work, but company doesn't respond so what good is the "5 year warranty"
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Does not turn off automatically
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great light if it would turn off automatically like it's supposed to. I have it set to turn off after a few minutes, but the light stays on for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Smilin

product_meta.title: LEONLITE LED Security Lights Motion Outdoor, Brown
feature_bullets: ✅ High-quality Motion Sensor: Equipped with superior motion sensor, this Dual-Head security light features highly sensitive 180° detection angle and 70ft long detection distance, it is suitable for both residential and commercial use

✅ Triple Operation Modes: ON TIME mode allows manual control of the light. AUTO mode allows the light to detect ambient luminous intensity and motion, providing much more applicable ways to use. DUSK TO DAWN features lighting up at dawn and lighting off at dusk

✅ Durable and Lasting: IP65 waterproof rating ensures the outdoor flood lights is protected against even harsh weather conditions. The outstanding lifespan of 50,000 hours can effectively reduce the frequency of replacing fixtures
✅ ETL Listed: 86.7% energy and costs saving by replacing your 150W halogen fixture with our 20W led motion light, save $715 during its long lifespan.

✅ Reliable Quality: This ETL listed product meets all regulatory requirements, ensuring a superior quality and safe operation，5-year product warranty guarantees your rights and interests from the day you make the purchase, providing a lifetime friendly customer service for you

specifications.Special Features: Auto-on smart motion detector, Up to 50,000 hours lifespan, 1800lm high brightness level, Resettable lighting direction and operating mode, 20W LED equivalent to 150W halogen
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,110 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
